subject: Re: http://websvn.samba.org/cgi-bin/viewcvs.cgi?view=rev&rev=22860
body:
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

On 05/22/2007 03:02 PM, Jeremy Allison wrote:
> On Tue, May 22, 2007 at 01:00:01PM -0500, Gerald (Jerry) Carter wrote:
>> Jeremy,
>>
>> What is up with the commit msg on this checkin?  Was
>> that a joke?
> 
> No, looks like a corrupt svn db.
> 
> The actual message was :
> 
> Replace unnecessary AC_TRY_RUN with AC_TRY_LINK. Fixes bug #2287.
> Please keep all branches in order.
> Jeremy.

	Seems like a "repeat action" in the editor (I would guess
vim). :-)  Because the line repeated itself exactly 22821 times.


	Kind regards,

- --
Felipe Augusto van de Wiel 
Coordenadoria de Tecnologia da Informação (CTI) - SEDU/PARANACIDADE
